channel.description: Well i wanna make a christmas event for my sever and i know how to do that but i was wordering if eneyone could help me whith how to make it snow just eney usfull info mation like links and that

item.title: Snowing FOR A christimas event 317 (manage to add thanks everyone)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:7, topic:462788”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=566007.msg4116852#msg4116852 date=1349145035]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=566007.msg4116846#msg4116846 date=1349144896]

i found it here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/357738-adding-snow-xmas-pi.html but i havent got flo.java do u knwo what file to use ?
[/quote]Can you post a picture of the classes in your client source folder?

Why need that if the poster put the class in there?
[/quote]Simply inputing a class wont do him any good. He would need to attach that class to other methods within other classes for it to do anything. Else, its just an unused class just sitting there. I am almost positive he has some sort of class that performs the same functions of Flo.java in his client. I just need to see what he has in there so I can identify it for him.[/quote]
I see. Smart thinking…

Read full topic
item.source: Snowing FOR A christimas event 317 (manage to add thanks everyone)

item.title: Snowing FOR A christimas event 317 (manage to add thanks everyone)
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:6, topic:462788”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=566007.msg4116846#msg4116846 date=1349144896]

i found it here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/357738-adding-snow-xmas-pi.html but i havent got flo.java do u knwo what file to use ?
[/quote]Can you post a picture of the classes in your client source folder?

Why need that if the poster put the class in there?[/quote]Simply inputing a class wont do him any good. He would need to attach that class to other methods within other classes for it to do anything. Else, its just an unused class just sitting there. I am almost positive he has some sort of class that performs the same functions of Flo.java in his client. I just need to see what he has in there so I can identify it for him.

Read full topic
